channel.title: What do you like about RSPS?
channel.description: I'm not sure if this is where I should post this, if It's not please move or remove. [hr] So I was just wondering just to see what the opinion of people is. When you guys reply, reply with what you love and hate about the private servers you have played. Don't leave any names of server just things you have hated about private servers you have played since you played RSPS. Like I know some people absolutely hate the idea of customs in general and some people hate emote button teleports. Some people love the fact that the server is very open there is alot to do, some people love servers that are closed in and its very easy to get around to do every. Some people like it when 100m is alot, some people like it when 100m is something you can make in 20 minutes. So basically just leave what you think is the good aspect of servers and bad aspect. I will leave me opinion then you guys leave your opinion. [hr] I don't like custom models- I think they are a waste of space that just adds time to the loading screen of your client. I don't like emote button teleports- I think it looks stupid when you could just add the teleports to the teleport tab where they belong. I like it when the server is very open and it takes more than one click of a button to get anywhere you want to because it puts more into the game. I like servers that show things that I myself or any other programmer on this community or any other community has yet to think of or atleast show. Basically new ideas.

item.title: What do you like about RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @RunesGAYpe RunesGAYpe
item.description:
@RunesGAYpe wrote:

I love developing servers a lot more than playing them because I enjoy the thinking and improvising involved and that I can do anything I want.

But whenever I’m on other peoples servers I like a medium sized pking server with a few safe zones and lots of skills to make money
I like when 100m would take an hour or so to earn.
And it needs to pay attention to detail

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RSPS?

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally, I don’t like playing RSPS’s. I just find it fun to be able to code something, and then have it show up as stuff other people can see and react to.

Well Vain I really wish you luck with it ^^, I’m having a bit of trouble with global objects on Hyperion =\

[quote="`Aaron, post:8, topic:372619"][quote author=RealmofTerror link=topic=468662.msg3426816#msg3426816 date=1292017694]

Fuck fakes?
That’s one paragraph, now go brush your bright neon hair you troll.
[/quote]

Ps; you’re an idiot, who the fuck has bright neon hair?[/quote]

item.title: What do you like about RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I like when someone takes the down to earth time to come up with a truly original idea that is fun and enjoyable for only those who don’t want 99 in an hour, but instead something that takes not only time for the ones who coded it, but also for the players who log on for the enjoyable experience. It’s not about how easy a server is, it’s about the commitment, and when someone leeches another delta or 525 pvp that’s on for 2 days, that shows neither effort nor skill.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RSPS?

item.title: What do you like about RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

I’ll like RSPS when people realise pking servers shouldn’t have an economy. There should be commands/buttons to spawn runes/food/pots/gear not sit at a stall and click for half an hour.

Read full topic
